title: VetKoles
author: VetKoles
content: guys, there is a project that recently interested me. you can also complete various quests and rewards fall for the top board.https://www.bridgenetwork.com/ https://t.me/BridgeNetwork0x https://twitter.com/bridgenetwork0x https://discord.com/invite/PGHnWapB8u https://www.reddit.com/r/bridgenetwork0x/ https://bridgenetwork.crew3.xyz/questboard

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Just to complete quests, it's better to create a separate wallet with a small amount of coins. You will have to interact with various smart contracts, as a result of a hack or mistake, you can lose all your coins. Take care of your main wallet.

comments.author: BigBos
comments.body: Quote from: VetKoles on November 23, 2022, 09:28:48 AMguys, there is a project that recently interested me. you can also complete various quests and rewards fall for the top board.What do I get if I follow this, here is only written ranking without any explanation about the reward that will be given by Bridge Network when increasing my XP, to be honest, I don't understand what new project you mean?Quote from: zasad@ on November 23, 2022, 02:58:51 PMJust to complete quests, it's better to create a separate wallet with a small amount of coins. You will have to interact with various smart contracts, as a result of a hack or mistake, you can lose all your coins. Take care of your main wallet.It is effective enough to protect the coins that you have, making the main wallet is indeed very important to maintain the security of the investment funds that we have, especially if you always follow airdrops events that are carried out by new networks, it is highly recommended to divide the main wallet and the wallet that receives rewards from events.

comments.author: VetKoles
comments.body: Well, here we are. Today I will tell you about an interesting and promising project Catapult Crew. The team has a certain experience and skill, which promise excellent forecasts for nailed.Sohttps://catapult.crew3.xyz/invite/vGTmV61R2ViXqb6fbog9ahere you can find quests for which you can get points and participate in the leaderboard:- participants who will take prizes will receive solid rewards:1st place — $10002nd Place — $5003rd place — $250.- also participants who took the top 4–10 will receive $ 100 each- participants from 11th — 25th place $25 each
